alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Keokuk; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:33PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Keokuk, western Johnson, south central Benton, northwestern Washington and Iowa Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1233 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parnell, or 14 miles south of Marengo, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Williamsburg around 1250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Conroy, Marengo and Amana. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 213 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
